reviewText: My grandchildren ages 5 and almost 3 love Max and Ruby.  This collection was a great success.  You get a few episodes--it kept them amused and the dvd was perfect for their age groups.  I enjoyed watching with them.

very cute movie for my grandkids and i love it too..it keeps them entertained for awhile. we usually watch this when winding down for the night. I'd been looking for this and knew amazon wld have it...
My 3 yr old grandson is absolutely enthralled with this series and there is no violence or suggestive comments.  Wonderful series for toddlers.
My grandchildren love the Max & Ruby DVD's. They are educational and relaxing, great to watch before nap or bedtime.
